name: Touhou Eternal Winter Incident
description:
Submission for Touhou Game Jam 10

Buy Mochi (leftmost stall) first to avoid locking you out of the ending (will be fixed after the Jam)

ALL SOUNDS ARE FROM  https://freesound.org

Cooking mini game does not work if you are in fullscreen

Click to show correct Jorge costumes:

Marisa

Reimu

Youmu

Yukari

Yuyuko

Controls  (Shrine) :

Left, Right, Up, Down : Move around.

E: Interact with NPCs

Controls  (Snowboard Minigame) :

Left and Right: Moves to the left and right.

Up: Jump over logs.

Down: Crouch below branches on the way.

Controls ( Snowball Minigame):

Mouse Cursor: Aim your snowball.

Mouse1: Shoot a snowball at your cursor.

Down: Crouch to dodge incoming snowballs.

Controls ( Dress-Up Minigame):

Mouse1: Drag objects and release on Jorge to dress him up with the correct clothes.

Controls ( Cooking Minigame):

Mouse1: Drag objects and release them on the pan. You must put ALL the ingredients in order, repeating the sequence each round (1, 1-2, 1-2-3, and so on)

Detailed Tutorial:

A game where you have to save spring as Reimu and Marisa, by talking to Lily White in the shrine you can access all the games. You have to get 2000 score or higher in each game to buy the items in the stores! Once you gather all items just deliver them at the tree to reach the ending

Radical Snowboard: Dodge incoming obstacles, you can jump over logs and crouch below branches.

Snowball Fight: Shoot snowballs at this stupid fairy and dodge incoming snowballs by crouching.

Dress-Up Jorge: Dress up Jorge as your favorite Touhou Character before the timer runs out.

Cooking with Sukuna: Put the ingredients on the pan in the order that is declared and remember the correct combination, each time you will receive a new ingredient to put at the end!
